title: Vincent Connare
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Vincent Connare**

Vincent Connare has been working professionally in the software industry producing font projects for corporations for over fifteen years. While working at Agfa/Compugraphic from 1987 till 1993 he was a member of the [Ikarus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ikarus), [Intellifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Intellifont) and [TrueType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TrueType) font production teams. At Agfa he was one of the first type designers to learn TrueType [hinting](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/hinting). He finalized the hinting of four TrueType fonts to Apple's first TrueType font pack.

In 1993 he joined [Microsoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Microsoft) Corporation as a Typographic Engineer and worked on custom type projects for Microsoft products. At Microsoft he designed and produced two of the most popular [typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typeface) of the 1990's, [Comic Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Comic%20Sans) and [Trebuchet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Trebuchet). There he also wrote documents relating to TrueType hinting and font production.

Today, Vincent is on the staff of [Dalton Maag Ltd.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/) A London based type design agency which specializes in corporate font solutions, branding, and type design.

Vincent is also an accomplished photographer and photo technician. He has worked as a newspaper photographer and darkroom technician and currently photographs TV presenters, actors and comedians. He has been published in advertisements and articles such as:  
 [Closer magazine - July..Aug 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.closermag.co.uk/)  
 [Spotlight (2006)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.spotlightcd.com/) [  
Creative Review – July 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.creativereview.co.uk/Home/Home.aspx)  
 [Nivea Fashion Police (UK) 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.nivea.co.uk/) advertising campaign.  
The University of Manchester (UK) 2006  
BBC 'Radio Times' 2006

Vincent was trained in painting and photography at [New York Institute of Technology](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/http/www.nyit.edu/) in New York City and has worked as a newspaper photographer and photographic technician in Massachusetts and a silkscreen fine art printer in New York City. Vincent holds a Master's Degree in Type Design from the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/http/www.rdg.ac.uk/) in Berkshire, England.

his website is : [www.connare.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140408094353/http:/www.connare.com/)
